txt.en:
'The battle has been joined upon the slopes above us [placeholder]. Fierce Rodelleth leads the Malledhrim in battle against the Orcs encamped in Gathbúrz, and strives to lay siege to the tower itself.

'Ultimately, she has not the Elves to defeat the walls of Dol Guldur, but with the aid of valiant warriors such as yourself, she may inflict grievious harm upon their forces.

'Once you have completed your tasks here, you should join her forces above.'

'Fuirgam has sent more reinforcements? What does he take me for, some delicate maiden in need of heroic rescue?

'Very well then. There are more than enough Orcs to go around, so take your pick - but unless the Lady herself strides forth or Fuirgam provides enough Elves that we can stride over its walls upon our own fallen, we're not likely to breach that tower by force.

'Still, we'll make a merry game of it, and any enemy who does dare emerge will pay swiftly for their folly.'
'Once you have completed your tasks here in Emyn Lûm, Rodelleth needs all the soldiers we can muster in Gathbúrz.'
Fuirgam has asked you to lend your aid to Rodelleth as she launches her assault upon Gathbúrz on the slopes before Dol Guldur.

Rodelleth is encamped at the captured tower of Thangúlhad in Gathbúrz, east of Ost Galadh.\n\nFuirgam has asked you to join Rodelleth's forces in battle against the Orcs of Gathbúrz before the gates of the tower of Dol Guldur.
